All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddCardToHand
Message sent form the server to inform the client that their player's hand has a new card.
AddCardToHandEvent
Event fired in the GUI when a new card has to be added to the player's hand.
AddCardToOtherHand
Message sent from the server to inform the client that another player has a new card in their hand.
AddCardToOtherHandEvent
Event fired in the GUI when a new card has to be added to the another player's hand.
AddChatMessagesEvent
Event fired in the GUI when (a) new chat message(s) is (are) received.
AddMessage
Message sent by the server to inform the client that a new message has arrived in their chat.
AddMessages
Message sent by the server to inform the client that multiple new messages have arrived in their chat.
AddMessages.Deserializer
Deserializer used to reload a AddMessages message from a JSON file.
AddPlayer
Message sent by the server to inform the client that a new player has joined their lobby.
AddPlayerEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when a new player joins the current lobby.
BoardCard
Class used to model the cards that can be placed on the player's board.
BoardCard.BoardCardSerializer
Custom serializer for BoardCard.
BoardCard.Deserializer
Custom deserializer for BoardCard.
BoardCard.KeyDeserializer
Custom key deserializer for BoardCards used in Maps.
Card
Class used to model all the cards in the game.
CardController
Controller class for card assets in the Graphical User Interface.
CardRegistry
Singleton object that contains all the cards present in the game.
CardSide
Class containing information about a card's side.
CardSide.PointMultiplierPolicy
Enum containing the existing policies to award points.
CardSide.Serializer
Custom serializer for CardSide, used when saving a player's playing field.
Chat
Class used to handle the receiving and sending of chat messages.
Chat.Deserializer
Deserializer used to reload a Chat object from JSON.
ChatController
Class used to handle the distribution of messages in a game.
ChatMessage
Record that holds all the information about a chat message.
ChatModel
Interface that defines the method used by the client to interact with the chat.
ChooseColor
Message sent by the client to inform the server that the player has chosen their color.
ChooseObjective
Message sent by the client to inform the server that the player has chosen their personal objective.
ChooseStarterSide
Message sent by the client to inform the server that the player has chosen on which side to play their starter card.
ChoosingColorsEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when the color-choosing phase of the game has begun.
CLI
Main class that handles a CLI client.
CLI.CLIState
Enum that contains the possible states of the CLI.
CLIAssetRegistry
Singleton utility class that loads assets for a CLI client.
CLICardAsset
Record that holds the front and back for a card.
CLICommand
Enum that contains the types of commands available to players in the Command Line Interface.
CLIConstants
Class that contains numeric constants that are used by the CLI to print cards and other in-game assets.
Client
Class to handle a client.
CLIInfoTable
Utility class to manage a table to display information about the number of each resource and object currently visible on a player's play field.
CLIInputManager
Runnable class to manage user input in the Command Line Interface.
CLIPlayArea
Utility class to manage a player's play area in the Command Line Interface.
CLIPointsTable
Utility class to manage a table to display information about the points that each player has scored.
CLIPositionLabelAsset
A utility class to manage labels used for marking spots on a player's play area where a card can be placed.
CLIText
Utility class to store and manage colored Command Line Interface Assets.
CodexGUI
The main class of the GUI.
CodexStart
Main class of the game.
ColorPopupController
Controller class for the popup that allows the player to select their color.
Cornerable
Interface implemented by all classes that represent an element that can be on one of a card's corners.
Cornerable.Deserializer
Custom deserializer for Cornerable.
Cornerable.KeyDeserializer
Key deserializer for when Cornerable is used as a Map key.
Cornerable.KeySerializer
 
Cornerable.Serializer
Custom serializer for Cornerable that serializes corner types with their name.
CornersIdx
Enum that contains the types of corner of a card.
CreateGame
Message sent by the client to the server to create a new game.
CreateScreenController
Controller for the screen that allows players to create a new game.
CreditsScreenController
Controller for the credits screen.
Deck<T>
Class used to model Decks of the given card type.
DeckFactory
Utility class to obtain new, already shuffled decks.
DrawCard
Message sent by the client to the server to draw a card.
DrawingCardsEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when cards are being drawn for the game.
DrawType
Enum used to define the various places where a player can draw a card from.
ElementFactory
Utility class that loads FXML files for GUI elements.
EndgameScreenController
Controller for the end game screen.
ErrorController
Controller for the error popup.
ErrorEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when an error occurs.
ErrorFactory
Factory class to convert errors sent by the server into GUI errors.
ErrorType
The possible types of errors that the client can encounter.
FilePaths
Class that contains all the static paths for resources.
Game
Class to handle game(s).
Game.Deserializer
Deserializer used to reload a game from a JSON file.
GameController
Controller for the Game.
GameModel
The game's interface.
GamesScreenController
Controller for the screen that displays the currently active games on the server.
GameState
Enum that includes the five game states.
GetGamesResponse
Message sent by the server to inform the client on what games are currently active on the server.
GetGamesResponse.Deserializer
Deserializer used to reload a GetGamesResponse message from a JSON file.
GoldCard
Class used to model gold cards.
GoldCard.Deserializer
Deserializer class for GoldCard.
GoldCardsDeck
Class used to handle decks of gold cards.
GridFillerController
Controller for fillers that are supposed to be placed inside the PlayAreaGridController to detect the player dropping cards.
GUIAssetRegistry
Utility class to retrieve asset names and paths.
GUIError
Interface for the GUI errors.
GUIEventTypes
Class that contains all the types of custom events which will be fired in the GUI.
GUIHomeError
Implementation of GUIError for errors that require the user to go back to the home screen.
GUIInnocuousError
Implementation of GUIError for error popups that can just be closed without further consequences.
GUIQuitError
Implementation of GUIError for critical errors that require the user to quit the application.
GUIState
Bean-like class that stores important information about the state of a GUI.
Hand
Handles a player's hand of resource and gold cards.
Hand.Deserializer
Custom deserializer for Hand.
HandController
Controller class for a player's hand GUI element.
HandModel
Interface for use by the controller and view to read a Hand's contents.
IllegalMoveException
Exception for handling illegal moves that reached the model.
InfoTableController
Controller class for the info table GUI element.
JoinGameRequest
Message sent by the client to the server to join an existing game.
JoinGameResponse
Message sent by the server to inform the client that their request to join a game was successful, together with information on the joined game.
JsonMapper
Singleton that contains the only instance required of ObjectMapper, used for serializing and deserializing objects into JSON and from JSON.
LobbyManager
Class to manage multiple games.
LobbyScreenController
Controller class for the lobby screen.
LobbyState
Enum that contains the possible states of a lobby.
MessageType
Enum that contains the types of TCP messages that can be sent, both from the server to the client, and from the client to the server.
NoStarterCardException
Exception to handle a client's request to play their starter card when they have not received one yet.
NotifyDontDrawEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when the game is about to finish, so cards should no longer be drawn from this point on.
ObjectiveCard
Class used to model objective cards.
ObjectiveCardsDeck
Class used to handle decks of objective cards.
ObjectivePopupController
Controller for the popup that allows the player to select their personal objective.
ObjectObjective
Class used to model objective cards that award points based on the objects visible on the player's board.
ObjectObjective.Deserializer
Deserializer class for ObjectObjective.
ObjectType
Enum that includes the game's objects.
OtherPlayerInfoController
Controller for a GUI element to show basic info about another player, such as their username and a restricted view of their hand.
PatternObjective
Class used to model objective cards that award points based on special patterns of cards present on the player's board.
PatternObjective.CardPattern
Class used to model card patterns used by PatternObjective.
PatternObjective.Deserializer
Deserializer class for PatternObjective.
Payload
Generic abstract class for a message payload.
PegController
The controller for GUI peg elements.
PlayableCard
Class used to model the card's that can be given to the player to play during the game.
PlayableCard.Deserializer
Custom deserializer for PlayableCard.
PlayableCardType
Enum that contains the possible types of PlayableCard.
PlayArea
Class representing the player's play area.
PlayArea.Deserializer
Custom deserializer for PlayArea.
PlayAreaGridController
 
PlayAreaModel
Interface to give external classes access to PlayArea-type objects.
PlayCardEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when a new card is played.
PlayCardRequest
Message sent by the client to the server to play a card.
PlayCardResponse
Message sent by the server to inform the client that a player has played a card.
PlayCardResponse.Deserializer
Custom deserializer for PlayCardResponse.
Player
Class to handle players in a game.
Player.Deserializer
Custom deserializer for Player, used for reloading player data from a game save file.
PlayerButtonController
 
PlayerColor
Enum that contains the player's color options.
PlayerModel
Interface to give external classes access to Player-type objects.
PlayScreenController
Controller for the main play screen.
PointsBoardController
Controller class for the points board.
Popup
Utility class to create informative popups.
Position
Record used to keep track of coordinates on game boards.
Position.KeyDeserializer
Deserializer for Position when used as keys for a Map.
Position.Serializer
Serializer for Position.
PromptColorChoice
Message sent by the server to inform the client that it is the turn of their player to choose a color.
PromptColorChoice.Deserializer
Deserializer used to reload a PromptColorChoice message from a JSON file.
PromptColorChoiceEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when it is the player's turn to choose their color.
PromptError
Message sent by the server to inform the client that an error has occurred.
PromptObjectiveChoice
Message sent by the server to inform the client that the player has to choose their personal objective.
PromptObjectiveChoice.Deserializer
Deserializer used to reload a PromptObjectiveChoice message from a JSON file.
PromptObjectiveChoiceEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when the player has to choose their personal objective.
PromptStarterChoice
Message sent by the server to inform the client that the player has to choose the side on which to play their starter card.
PromptStarterChoiceEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when the player has to choose on which side to place their starter card.
RejoinInformationEndEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when information about a game which is being resumed is about to be sent.
RejoinInformationStartEvent
Event that is fired in GUI when information about a game which is being resumed is done being sent.
RemoteClientInterface
Interface that contains the methods used by the server to communicate with the client.
RemoveCardFromHand
Message sent from the server to inform the client that their player's hand no longer has a card.
RemoveCardFromHandEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when a card has to be removed from the player's hand.
RemoveCardFromOtherHand
Message sent from the server to inform the client that another player no longer has a card in their hand.
RemoveCardFromOtherHandEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when a card has to be removed from another player's hand.
ResourceCard
Class used to model resource cards.
ResourceCard.Deserializer
Deserializer class for ResourceCard.
ResourceCardsDeck
Class used to handle decks of resource cards.
ResourceObjective
Class used to model objective cards that award points based on the resources visible on the player's board.
ResourceObjective.Deserializer
Deserializer class for ResourceObjective.
ResourceType
Enum that includes the game's resource types.
RestrictedCard
Record that is used to keep track of a restricted view of a card.
RMIClientImplementation
Implementation of the client's RMI interface.
RMIServerImplementation
Implementation of the ServerInterface for RMI connections.
RNG
Singleton class that holds a single instance of Random.
RulesPopupController
Controller class for the popup that displays game rules.
RulesScreenController
Controller for the rules screen.
SendChatMessage
Message sent by the client to the server when the player wants to send a public chat message.
SendPrivateChatMessage
Message sent by the client to the server when the player wants to send a private message to another player.
Server
Main class for the Server.
ServerInterface
Interface used to handle the communication between the server and the clients.
SetColor
Message sent by the server to the client to tell them that a player has been assigned their color.
SetColorEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when a player has chosen their color.
SetCommonCards
Message sent by the server when the common cards from which players can draw from have changed.
SetCommonCardsEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI to tell the view which cards the players can draw from.
SetCommonObjectives
Message sent by the server to inform the client on what the common objectives for this game are.
SetCommonObjectivesEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI to tell the view what the common objectives for the game are.
SetDeckTopType
Message sent by the server to inform the client about the types of cards that are on top of the decks.
SetDeckTopTypeEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when the type of the card on top of a deck changes.
SetEndGameInfoEvent
Event fired in the GUI when the game ends and info about the winners and all the personal objectives are sent to the clients.
SetGamePoints
Message sent by the server to inform a client that the number of game points of a player has changed.
SetGamePointsEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when the number of game points of a player changes.
SetGamesListEvent
Event fired in the GUI when the list of active games is communicated by the server.
SetGameState
Message sent by the server to inform the client that the state of the game has changed.
SetGameStateEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when the state of the game changes.
SetHand
Message sent by the server to inform the client about the cards in the player's hand.
SetHand.Deserializer
Deserializer used to reload a SetHand message from a JSON file.
SetHandEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when the player's hand of cards is being communicated by the server.
SetObjectivePoints
Message sent by the server to inform a client that the number of objective points of a player has changed.
SetObjectivePointsEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when the number of objective points scored by a player is calculated.
SetOtherHand
Message sent by the server to inform the client about the cards in another player's hand.
SetOtherHand.Deserializer
Deserializer used to reload a SetOtherHand message from a JSON file.
SetOtherHandEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when the another player's restricted view of the hand of cards is being communicated by the server.
SetPersonalObjective
Message sent by the server to tell the client what the player's personal objective is.
SetPersonalObjectiveEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when the player's personal objective is set.
SetPlayArea
Message sent by the server to tell the client a player's play area state.
SetPlayArea.Deserializer
Custom deserializer for SetPlayArea.
SetPlayAreaEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when an entire play area is being communicated by the server.
SetPlayers
Message sent by the server to inform the client about the usernames of players currently in the game.
SetPlayers.Deserializer
Deserializer used to reload a SetPlayers message from a JSON file.
SetPlayersEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when the list of players currently in a lobby is being given.
SetStartOrder
Message sent by the server to communicate in which order the players will play.
SetStartOrder.Deserializer
Deserializer used to reload a SetStartOrder message from a JSON file.
SetStartOrderEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when the server has established the order in which players will play.
SetWinners
Message sent by the server to tell the client who the winners of the game are.
SetWinners.Deserializer
Deserializer used to reload a SetWinners message from a JSON file.
SideType
Enum that includes the types of sides of a card.
SignalDeadlock
Message sent by the server to signal the client that a player has deadlocked themselves, and thus their turn is skipped.
SignalDeadlockEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when a player has deadlocked themselves, and thus their turn is being skipped.
SignalDisconnection
Message sent by the server to inform the client that a player has disconnected.
SignalDisconnectionEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when a player disconnects from the current lobby.
SignalGameDeletion
Message sent by the server to inform the client that a player has disconnected, causing the game to be deleted.
SignalGameDeletionEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when a player disconnects from a game, and the game is being deleted as a result.
SignalGameSuspension
Message sent by the server to inform the client that a player has disconnected, causing the game to be suspended.
SignalGameSuspensionEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when a player disconnects from a game, and the game is being suspended as a result.
SpecialType
Enum that includes Cornerable elements that are neither Resources nor Objects.
StarterCard
Class used to model starter cards.
StarterCard.Deserializer
Deserializer class for StarterCard.
StarterCardsDeck
Class used to handle decks of starter cards.
StarterPopupController
Controller for the popup that allows players to select on which side to play their starter card.
TCPClient
This class is a Runnable that is meant to handle incoming and outgoing messages for a TCP client.
TCPClientHandler
Class that is used by the server to handle a single client connected via TCP/Socket.
TCPMessage
Record that contains information about a TCP message.
Turn
Message sent by the server to the client to notify the start of a player's turn.
TurnEvent
Event that is fired in the GUI when a new turn starts.
UnexpectedActionException
Exception thrown by the model when commands reach it that are not permissible for some reason, specified in the message.
UnknownObjectiveCardException
Exception thrown by Player when setting an Objective Card that is not in the options given.
ViewInterface
Interface that includes all the methods needed to set up, start and update the game view.
VirtualView
Class used to store all the player views.
WelcomeRMIServer
Interface used to handle the creation of new instances of RMIServerImplementation.
WelcomeRMIServerImplementation
Implementation of the RMI server that handles the creation of new instances of RMIServerImplementation.
WelcomeScreenController
Controller for the welcome screen.
WelcomeTCPServer
Class used to handle the creation of new instances of TCPClientHandler.
